rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a vestibule leading to the central courtyard, incorporating traditional Indian motifs and Vastu principles for positive energy.
Open plan living area adjacent to the entrance hall and overlooking the courtyard. Vastu principles ensure that this space is in a favorable direction for social gatherings.
A dining area adjacent to the living room with a view of the courtyard. Decorated with natural lighting and ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

Modern yet traditional kitchen layout with ample storage and an open plan design to maintain visual connectivity with the dining area. Vastu considerations ensure that the kitchen is positioned in a safe zone.
Master bedroom with attached balcony overlooking the courtyard. Designed following Vastu to enhance calmness and privacy.
Private bathroom for the master bedroom with water-efficient fixtures and natural light considerations as per Vastu.

openings.description: Main entry door with security features and traditional design elements. Aligned as per Vastu for auspicious entry.
Windows leading to the central courtyard, ensuring natural light and ventilation. Placed according to Vastu for energy flow.

central_courtyard.description: A large open space at the center of the ground floor that allows natural light and ventilation into all adjoining rooms. Incorporates water features and greenery as per Vastu principles to promote balance and harmony.
